file_content.text: You'll let Alys know I'm okay, won't you?
I got your cred stick back.
So you did. Let me just have a look and.... There, you should be able to access the files now.
Sorry if I was harsh earlier. All this--it's not easy. But I do have one favor to ask.
Just... tell Alys I'm alright. You do that, and I'll owe you one.
I can't help you without that cred stick.
Yeah, that's me. How did--wait, let me guess: Alys sent you. Figures.
She must know I can't go anywhere without my head exploding. So that means you're after the intel I dug up.
Don't worry, the information is safe. Problem is, I don't have it on me.
Alys thought you'd stashed it someplace.
She knows my tricks. Even taught me a few herself.
I stored the data on a modified cred stick. Guards pinched it when they processed me. Didn't have a clue what it was.
Chances are one of them still has it. You get it back, and I'll decrypt the information for you.
